website_summaries.verdict: This trendy messenger bag will accommodate your entire Nintendo Switch system and even comes with a compact carry case for days when you prefer to travel light.
pros: Fantastic combination of style and functionality
Good size with a variety of compartments is ideal for transporting everything from the console, Joy-Cons, and grip to a dock, games, cables, and more
Removable case for on-the-go handheld gaming
cons: Fitting in 2 pro controllers alongside other accessories can be a tight squeeze

customer_reviews.title: Quite nice
customer_reviews.text: I really like bags designed with organization in mind. This bag delivers. It contains a pouch with case for the Switch, a compartment to hold the dock or other large peripherals, a slot for the charger and another compartment to hold your Joy-Con grip or pro controller plus game case. The material appears to be quite durable but I won't know until I use it for longer than a week. I plan to travel a lot with this and will update my post if there are any long term issues. So far I am satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Eyal Novotny

customer_reviews.title: Great!!!👍🏼 Bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: No problems. Fits both types of controllers. I lifted pro controller to show both controls Only request is for a extra slot for a mini screen, monitor. Would be cool, not big deal. For that case for switch, it fits with grips too.
customer_reviews.author: That Human Over There!

customer_reviews.title: Impressive quality
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to order a bag for our Switch, and I wasn't convinced of the quality when I purchased this one. I'm pleasantly surprised by the quality of this bag and the device case it includes. It is definitely something I can trust to protect the Switch and its gear. The structure inside is perfect for staying organized and carrying anything we might need, if we take it along on a trip. For now (short periods of time) I just use the small hard case the bag comes with and toss the switch in my purse. The hard case is so well-made. We definitely reccomend this bag for anyone looking for this style of carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: J Noel

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent case, but...
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and quality of the bag. It is larger than I expected. I am unsure why, but I thought that it would be a bit smaller, half it's size actually, it's the size of a laptop case, I was thinking more of a small purse. All in all, it's a pretty decent case, there's space for the dock, that was the main selling point for me. There is also a separate case for the switch console. Only downside is that it doesn't offer much space for anything else such as games ect, and with the size being bigger than I expected it should offer more room.
customer_reviews.author: pcamille

customer_reviews.title: Best Switch Bag Out There IMO
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag, it's one million times nicer than the little tiny bag most people carry, in fact, it even includes one of those mini bags for the switch itself. The only thing I would change is that it could use just a little more room. I know that sounds crazy but we tried to take the games, the system, 2 extra joy cons, 1 controller for the joy cons the wires and our extra charger and it was a very, very tight fit.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie A.

customer_reviews.title: A teensy bit smaller than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I bought my switch and I also bought 4 joy con grips(to hold like a controller) and also a charger for my 4 joy cons. Everything fit except my charger(because it's round) but the bag itself was straining to hold everything together. I am still happy with this purchase I just wish I had a little more room to put everything there together. It's alright though, I don't travel a lot so I will only be using this when I go places.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Nintendo Switch Case
customer_reviews.text: I'll admit, Nintendo has done a great job in this carrying case. It feels great and looks great as well. Both inside and outside of the case makes you feel that Nintendo really took their time into making this case. It can definitely carry everything you need for the switch if you were on the go to a friend's house. I was surprised with the smaller portable case that's included for the Switch. The only thing I would recommend is to purchase a small portable case for your games as that's not included in the bag.
customer_reviews.author: apierrelouis

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT as big as it seems.
customer_reviews.text: It holds my Switch console, the dock, ONE pro controller OR Joy-Con grip, power and HDMI cables. There is no place to store game cartridges. The zippered pocket on the outside has almost no give and will not take a controller or a game holder unless it is ultra-slim. I bought a case on Amazon that holds 64 game cartridges. It measures 6.5"x5"x2". As small as the cartridge case is it doesn't fit ANYWHERE in this bag unless you leave something out. It's ok for a system but what will you play? I can't recommend it as a carry-all for your system. Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: ClassicGMR

customer_reviews.title: We love our Nintendo Switch so much that we travel with ...
customer_reviews.text: We love our Nintendo Switch so much that we travel with it frequently and wanted a case to travel with and this does the job! I love that all the parts including the charging dock fits into this case and it comes with an individual travel case just for the switch if you're on the go. It was available as a lightning deal for a great price and I'm glad we snagged it! Traveled well on many flights! It's light weight yet protects everything nicely!
customer_reviews.author: Sayurichan

customer_reviews.title: Serves its purpose, but doesn't protect loose controllers.
customer_reviews.text: I had a couple of spare joy-con controllers lose in the bag. The thumbsticks would no longer click and had to be sent in for warranty repair. Thankfully, they were still within warranty (1 year if it came with console, 3 months if bought separately), so when I explained to Nintendo that a "Licensed by Nintendo" carrying case had damaged my thumbsticks, they repaired them at no charge. (2 weeks)
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: great case
customer_reviews.text: this case only has room for the following: -two joy-con controllers -one Nintendo Joy-Con Charging Grip -the gaming system -nintendo switch docking station -HDMI and power cables pros: -looks great -has room for the system and needed accessories -makes a great case for storing the system or for traveling with it. cons: -no room for games. however the zipper compartment in the back can fit a game or two as long as the game is in its retail case.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Its great. Fits all my accessories.
customer_reviews.text: The messenger bag style makes it a comfortable travel bag. What I really like about the bag is its not huge and it has enough wiggle room for me to pack all my accessories. I am able to safely pack in the bag: the dock, the HDMI cable, the power adapter, the Switch, a Pro controller, 2 joy-cons mounted in the joy-con comfort grip, and 4 joy-con straps. Also, really enjoy the Switch case that comes with the bag - good protection that allows me to put my Switch in my backpack on trips where I just play the handheld (on the way to work or trip home).
customer_reviews.author: Manuel Guillen

customer_reviews.title: Fits all the things needed. Even fits the Hori ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits all the things needed. Even fits the Hori stand in the spot with the Switch dock, although tight. Hori game card case also fits in with the AC adapter. The Switch pro controller spot holds it or a Joycon + grip really well. I can also slip in 2 loose joycon in that spot, with the pro controller.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for the Switch
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for the Switch. I love the fact that it has the smaller carrying case just for the Switch itself so I can just take that with me if that's all I need. This bag is perfect and fits all the things I like to take with me for the best Switch experience. I got my Switch, my games, extra cables, a charger, the Joy Con Grip, an extra controller, a battery pack and there's still room for more stuff. I would highly recommend this bag. It feels like it is well made and high quality. Very happy so far with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This messenger bag is perfect for the switch
customer_reviews.text: This messenger bag is perfect for the switch. Its compact but has a safe place for every necessary switch item to ride along in. My switch is safe in the case this bag comes with that then fastens in to a Velcro closure pouch. I've been able to fit all the dock equipment and cords as well as a controller, extra charger, games & cleaning materials. I would absolutely recommend this for anyone who plans to take their switch and its gear on the go! Honestly you could probably take out the Velcro dividers and bring other things along besides the docking gear.
customer_reviews.author: Ly.

customer_reviews.title: Light.
customer_reviews.text: This case has just enough room to take your Switch where you want it. and the small carry case inside for the main console is also a good standalone as it is- so this is essentially like buying two cases! And it feels so light that sometimes I wonder if I forgot something- nope! its all here: dock, charging cable, HDMI, gamepad, joycons, joycon handle, controller pro, and games.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Could be a Little Bigger
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for easy transfer for vacations and parties. The bag is excellent! However, I wish the bag was just a little bigger so that I could hold one more pro controller. But it has storage for another set of joy cons so I have rarely needed 2 pro controllers. The small travel case that it comes with gets the job done but I feel like it wouldn't provide as much protection as other cases.
customer_reviews.author: Erick

customer_reviews.title: Great Affordable Switch Bag
customer_reviews.text: Holds quite a few things, I like the option of the smaller case, everything is fine with the design and strap. Price is right. It probably wouldn't hold up well to getting soaked or other sources of severe wear and tear (I believe there's cardboard liners giving it its shape). But, there's really no reason a game console bag should be subjected to any abuse, plus, to make a more resilient version would probably double the price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Spacious bag, branded, love it !
customer_reviews.text: Spacious bag. Fits all my joycon accessories, switch, console, wires, games and an additional power bank. More room than expected. The bag is low key and very professional looking. It holds everything you need for the switch. I also like that it is branded with Nintendo Switch Logo.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Spagnuolo

customer_reviews.title: Compartmentalized roomy bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag was for my son. He loves it! We had to return the first one due to a manufacturing defect. The closing zipper wasn’t sewn correctly. The replacement bag is perfect. I would highly recommend for those who like to take their switch everywhere with many controllers to do battles/competitions.
customer_reviews.author: MZB

customer_reviews.title: Neat little contraption
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty legit bag. Slightly bigger than I thought. it is very roomy and fits everything in the original switch box. I's almost as big as a laptop bad which is unfortunate, but it does have a removable pouch which I like and sorta makes up for the rest of the bulkiness.
customer_reviews.author: L.Layale

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't hold everything in the Switch box and 1 pro controller. Too small for just the basics.
customer_reviews.text: Better than the Nintendo hard case one that I tried but this doesn't fit everything that I want. I bought the Switch, and the pro controller. This bag doesn't hold the switch, pro controller, the free joy con handle, dock and cables which is super sad. So my only option is a giant backpack to simply hold what came in the Switch box and 1 pro controller?
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: GREAT BAG!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Keeps everything nice and neat! It even comes with a hard cover for the actual Nintendo Switch, which I really like because it is even more protected from damage while traveling. It also has the Nintendo Switch logo all over the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: It's a good bag with enough space for the switch
customer_reviews.text: It's a good bag with enough space for the switch, the wires and the controller but not enough space for the games
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: I personally Like the Nintendo switch backpack better because I can hold ...
customer_reviews.text: I personally Like the Nintendo switch backpack better because I can hold more things in there. For example I can also put my phone, wallet and car keys along with my laptop and if I wanted to bring more items I can. I gave this bag to my brother and he loves it. it all depends on what your use is going to be with it and you can decide from there
customer_reviews.author: Jmidnight

customer_reviews.title: ... could not imagine any way this bag could be better. My husband and I absolutely love it
customer_reviews.text: I could not imagine any way this bag could be better. My husband and I absolutely love it. I highly recommend it to anyone who plans to transport their Switch, especially if they want to transport the whole system and not just the handheld portion. Also, the smaller case for the handheld portion is removable, so you COULD just take the handheld part if you wanted to.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L.

customer_reviews.title: Case is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Needed a nice compact travel bag for the Switch. Seem's to be really high quality, love the included small hardshell case for the Switch for on the go when I don't need to bring my dock. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: the best deal!
customer_reviews.text: I was wanting a simple case for the switch in handheld mode, but I stumbled upon this messenger bag that comes with a small case for the switch that you can take out and carry without using the whole bag. It was the best deal, because now I have a case for the switch in handheld and the entire switch when I travel with it. I have the animal crossing switch, so I decided to get some protection for it. Love it and I just got it. Cannot wait to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Koby Poff

customer_reviews.title: Good bag
customer_reviews.text: My buddy in work told me about this case after looking for one. Thought it would be a bit smaller but its actually perfect for everything. Well built, wont last forever but will do the job for a long time. Good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: MikeyODonovan

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice bag for the switch! I especially like the lil travel case that you could use outside of the bag also. Fits everything nicely, only wish there was a place to put the game cards.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for people wanting to take their switch everywhere.
customer_reviews.text: This bag comes with everything you could ever want to safely carry your switch. the build quality is great, the bag looks great and it fits everything including my games/dock/pro controller/system cables etc. I love this set the switch in, lock it up and i dont have to worry about hurting it.
customer_reviews.author: Zergonomics

customer_reviews.title: Holds the system but nothing else
customer_reviews.text: Good for holding the switch and one controller. That's it. Won't hold much else as there isn't room. I had to buy a separate case for game cartridges so we didn't have to tote around a bunch of large game cases for a 1" game cartridge.
customer_reviews.author: LoyalShopper

customer_reviews.title: Average bag; no strap
customer_reviews.text: Average quality bag for the price. Compartments were spacious, and the velcro dividers allow you to separate cables from other items. The removable clamshell-type zippered case is thin and lightweight (but also offers little protection against big drops/strong impacts). The entire bag itself is cushioned and the front flap has what feels like a stiff slab of cardboard keeping its shape together. What was the most disappointing was that my bag did not come with the strap that the product claimed to have. If you are looking to carry this over your shoulder/hang it by the strap, perhaps look for a different bag.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: IF YOU WANT A CASE THAT HOLDS EVERYTHING, THIS IS IT...
customer_reviews.text: Just what I was looking for. Holds everything that came in the original Switch box AND comes with a separate bonus case that just holds the game console with the JoyCons attached. There's room in the back compartment for a couple of retail game cartridge boxes too, but I'm getting a separate box thing that just holds the cartridges.
customer_reviews.author: D. Grieco Jr.

customer_reviews.title: It looks good but feels cheap, and it doesn’t have a lot of space
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as well as the kootek shock proof case and compared them. The bag while it looks convenient, feels cheap. The sections are just divided by Velcro tabs. If you’re looking for something to transport your switch I would use an actual case, you can get them cheaper and better quality.
customer_reviews.author: Blake anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love using this bag to carry around my Switch
customer_reviews.text: Love using this bag to carry around my Switch! The only issue I've had is fitting both the power adapter and the HDMI cable in the small slot. It probably just takes some practice. The bag is very light and looks great. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Y

customer_reviews.title: Tiny
customer_reviews.text: Really small, it's more functional for some one whom is bringing a switch for a party, not so mutch for traveling as there is no room for anything but the switch.
customer_reviews.author: Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Nice size with good protection
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size for all the stuff that comes in the bundle. However, to hold a pro controller, I cannot pack the little dual “holder” that comes in the bundle (I never use that anyway). Well padded also for protection.
customer_reviews.author: Mimsie

customer_reviews.title: Great bag would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a great travel bag, it has a decent amount of room. I was able to fit my switch, the dock, a pro controller, the joycon controller and all associated cables. It comes with a small carrying case for the switch but it's not a hard shell so be careful. There is also a extra storage compartment in the back of the bag too. The bag is soft so be careful when carrying it it wouldn't hold well against a drop or banging into things.
customer_reviews.author: Drew C

customer_reviews.title: It's perfect for the switch and it's accessories
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for the switch and it's accessories. Everything fits nicely. There is nothing to hold games, so we had to order that separately, but it fits in here nicely. The compartment dividers are a little flimsy, but overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: UncookieCutter

customer_reviews.title: This is the best bag ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bag ever. It holds all of my Switch games, console, and controller all very nicely and easy for transport. It is just a tad bit smaller than the bag for my 15.6 inch laptop bag, so that's around how big it is in comparison. Perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Good item. Good price.
customer_reviews.text: My son uses this. Everything fits, so he no longer has to carry everything in a fabric shopping bag. Neat. Organized. Lightweight. Perfect.
customer_reviews.author: A Mommy in MN

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: Way better than I expected, plenty of room for everything and yes if your a new father like some of us you can even store the extras that you carry around as a new parent.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Shull

customer_reviews.title: Great carryall
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my grandson. He wanted a carry case to hold everything..and it does. He loves it. He prefers the should strap and we were able to adjust it to fit his 9 year old body.
customer_reviews.author: Ase

customer_reviews.title: Necessity for anyone who carries the full dock assembly
customer_reviews.text: If you care about your switch and you take the dock assembly to your bros' homes, then this is an absolute must. It has compartments for everything you need to bring, and even room in the back pocket for up to 4 original game cases. Very comfortable and lightweight. Good quality. The pocket for the switch case has enough room for the bigger cases with game compartments. Well worth the money. Get this, a screen protector, and silicone joy con grips for full switch protection and quality of life for under $60.
customer_reviews.author: Pedro

customer_reviews.title: Spot for everything
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag! When my son takes the switch anywhere, I can be assured that there is a spot for literally every piece. The zip up pouch inside is well insulated for extra protection. Highly recommend this bag.
customer_reviews.author: NTYAVG

customer_reviews.title: great case
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic case for the switch, with compartments for all the essentials and a "bonus" case for the switch itself.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! But kind of compact.
customer_reviews.text: The bag is as described/shown. But the amount of space in general is kind of lacking. It fits the bare essentials. I think one of the biggest things it lacks is simple game card slots. If there was a card slot in the case that comes with it or maybe a slot on the top inside of the bag, it would be a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: Kodi

customer_reviews.title: Even though I’m not going anywhere
customer_reviews.text: I may not be taking my switch over to anyone’s house anytime soon but at least I have a very, spacious and durable looking bag for switch and its accessories when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Kauhane-Lono

customer_reviews.title: Great travel case which can hold nearly everything of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great travel case which can hold nearly everything of a NS, and it's compact and small enough to travel with. I'm very satisfied with it. However, it could be much better if includes some game card slots, even though it does leave some space at back. A gamer cannot have only one game, and he has to buy a game card case additionally.
customer_reviews.author: Xuan

customer_reviews.title: Works as intended.
customer_reviews.text: Fits everything nicely however if you buy other accessories you may not have enough room.
customer_reviews.author: J. Boyd Jr

customer_reviews.title: Best bag for carrying Nintendo and accessories
customer_reviews.text: Great quality for a great price. This is a better deal and bag than the small overpriced cases. Go with this!!
customer_reviews.author: tl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with my switch and it works amazing; you can fit literally everything in it, including the charger, HDMI cord, the TV port, and different controller options. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Springer

customer_reviews.title: Can't fit another carrying case in.
customer_reviews.text: The carrying case they provide you with is fine enough but it almost feels like they want you to replace it it's so thin. However no matter what carrying case I get I can't seem to get one that fits in the little carrying case pocket. They probably could've fixed this by creating the pocket a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: purfect product
customer_reviews.text: this is an excellent bag to protect and organize all of my sons parts and pieces for his Nintendo switch
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Fisher

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this case for my son's switch. It's perfect as it stores everything to compliment it's portability. I definitely recommend this carry case. Price is very reasonable for the great quality. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Chochy

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking case that carries whole Switch system.
customer_reviews.text: My son loved this! He carries his Switch several times a year back/forth from college and this bag will hold everything he needs. It's a nice looking and good quality product. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: TrvlOften

customer_reviews.title: I like it...
customer_reviews.text: Everything fit perfectly, I even got my pro controller to fit. I don’t know why I was expecting some sort of storage for the actual games, and this bag doesn’t necessarily have that. But now that I saw the specs again, I saw that it wasn’t something this included. Only hd it for a day, but seems sturdy and pf good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Santana

customer_reviews.title: Great Carrying Bag
customer_reviews.text: My go to carrying bag for my Nintendo Switch, take this everywhere I go whenever I travel. Has everything you can ask for to take your Nintendo Switch on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Alexey Garcia

customer_reviews.title: This is form over function.
customer_reviews.text: Not big enough, no place for physical game cards. Awkward fit of the components. Form over function here.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Worth iit
customer_reviews.text: Like the material on time arrival will feel safer lugging around the switch with this!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty good!
customer_reviews.text: Great build quality and works great for traveling with the switch! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: Sleek, large capacity and secure options
customer_reviews.text: Has a ton of spaces available for the switch itself, dock, HDMI cable, power cable, along with extra space for joy cons, charger, etc. The separate case for the Switch is also very nice, but is only able to hold the switch and the attached joy cons, so it's great to take on its own if you don't need to tote any extra physical games.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin R.

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best thing for my switch and all its accessories. The really cool thing about it is that the sections are detachable so u can set it up in the bag however u like it and it's protected. Now I can take my switch everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Liyah

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: Has many compartments for each controller, games, ect. Protective and and useful for trips or just for storage.
customer_reviews.author: Chacha

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Came with a removable portable case when you don’t need all accessories. Has room to bring the dock and all standard accessories in a messenger bag.
customer_reviews.author: J. Herman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is the single most useful switch accesory I have ever purchased. Makes everything feel safe and secure and fits the whole assembly for going to a friends house and wanting to avoid being stuck with handheld mode for party games.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Worth It!
customer_reviews.text: Had my concerns purchasing this seeing some negative reviews however, there is no issue with fitting any items into the carrier bag. I was able to fit my games, extra joy-cons, pro controllers, the wires and console easily and it looks great. I absolutely recommend purchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! So easy to carry everything around
customer_reviews.text: Love this! So easy to carry everything around. Comes with an awesome little case for easy on the go carrying just the switch. Has a zipper in the back which fits games or the universal charger.
customer_reviews.author: shelby

customer_reviews.title: Very Late Review
customer_reviews.text: Been using it for 3 years and it's been very sturdy. It fits majority of my switch products.
customer_reviews.author: Tin Ngo

customer_reviews.title: good value at that
customer_reviews.text: Got this half price on prime day, good value at that. The only downside is no built-in game storage, like many other cases offer. But I did order and amazon-basics slim case with built-in storage, and it is thin enough to fit in the same slot. Not as big as I was expecting, but holds most of what you'd want in a full-size case.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well built and fits every thing you need, including the dock , cables and a pro controller. Nice bag for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Wierdo

customer_reviews.title: Good bag.
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bag. The extra little case just for the Switch is a great idea and allows you to bring the Switch protected when you don’t need or want to carry all of the accessories with you.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: this bag is perfect!
customer_reviews.text: This case does everything that I needed it to. It holds everything that comes with the Switch. My only complaint is that it doesn't have much room to hold anything more than exactly what came in the Switch box. I wish they would have made an additional sleeve inside for a tablet or magazines. Other than that, this bag is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Devin S.

customer_reviews.title: Love the details!
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality had it over 2 years and still great product.
customer_reviews.author: DonVazquez

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than what I expected
customer_reviews.text: This was beautiful! And I love the handle! However It looked bigger in the picture than what it really is
customer_reviews.author: Coralis Mejias

customer_reviews.title: Gift was perfect
customer_reviews.text: Recipient of the gift was really excited. It was an “extra” for his switch that he wasn’t going to buy right away so I did for him.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S. Grana

customer_reviews.title: This bag is perfect for carrying my switch and more
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for carrying my switch and more! I can carry everything with my switch along with other chargers, Android controller that is about the same size as an Xbox One controller and my 8 inch tablet. Seems to be good quality.
customer_reviews.author: HUgeneral

customer_reviews.title: Great product that holds most Nintendo Switch accessories
customer_reviews.text: It's been 2 months since I purchased this Messenger Bag and everything is still great. I use it almost every week day when I bring my Nintendo Switch to work, and having every accessories with me inside the bag makes it so useful because sometimes I go to my friend's houses to play multiplayer games. I would recommend this product to anyone who's looking for a great bag to hold most Nintendo Switch accessories.
customer_reviews.author: Creed

customer_reviews.title: Great Case
customer_reviews.text: This travel case is excellent. It has plenty of space to put the console, dock, joygrips, cords, and any other attachments needed. I was pleasantly surprised that it came with its own portable switch case. While not the quality of the RDS case, it still makes for an excellent backup case. The bag itself is made from pretty nice material, and everything stays in place while in transit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, big, good quality, and lots of storage to carry stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Purplerosa22

customer_reviews.title: Amazing bag!
customer_reviews.text: I love this bag! The only issue I have with it is that the hard case that it comes with for the switch itself was somewhat warped and hard to unzip and open. Other than that it's awesome. The dividers inside are removable and everything feels pretty sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Has enough room for the default ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Has enough room for the default Nintendo Switch setup and even a game or two in their case.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Great price great quality especially the handheld case. I would highly recommend especially if you often travel with your switch.
customer_reviews.author: ray mojica

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and great overall
customer_reviews.text: Great travel and storage bag for a Switch console. Works and handles well. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Ovies

customer_reviews.title: Broken
customer_reviews.text: nice bag but it was broken from factory is a hit or miss but not a bad product. The portable case inside is great quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: GONZO

customer_reviews.title: Great carry vase
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this case for his switch! Easy to transport!
customer_reviews.author: T. P.

customer_reviews.title: The fit and finish is excellent and should do a decent job of protecting everything ...
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as advertised. The fit and finish is excellent and should do a decent job of protecting everything while holding most accessories and remaining relatively compact. I was able to fit the following items into the case. Switch console docking station power adaptor USB cable HDMI cable pro controller 2 joycons (without comfort grip) Hori compact stand several games
customer_reviews.author: Brian O'Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Its nice, I would like it more if it had ...
customer_reviews.text: Its nice, I would like it more if it had a zipper on the top part, but I guess they need it to actually close, so its not a bad design, ALSO I want to mention to anyone planning to buy this, it HAS a zipper pocket on the BACK, there are no pictures, but there is one there, it was a nice surprise to see one.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it
customer_reviews.text: He liked everything and took it with him all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Caryl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Better than expected. Perfect size and design for everything. I love the branding and colors.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce M

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: Great bag and you get a switch case. Two for the price of one, kinda.
customer_reviews.author: Memo

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great but unfortunately no place for game cartridge storage. Like the over the shoulder bag and separate case for switch itself that fits nicely in bag
customer_reviews.author: Steven W.

customer_reviews.title: It's cool, but uncomfortable to put the cables
customer_reviews.text: Maybe and inch more would do it, but this is the best bag for a switch kit in the market, I would add a little more space so the cables don't struggle(isn't bad at all how it is, but I'm to picky) and maybe a place to save one game box or a game card box. Excellent product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Switch Messager bag
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this bag. It holds the switch, games and charger.
customer_reviews.author: I. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Switch necessity
customer_reviews.text: Great Switch accessory; holds everything; protects well. My son likes it.
customer_reviews.author: Cachecount

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Has a lots of space, the nintendo switch and all the accessories fit perfectly
customer_reviews.author: luis ruiz ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great bag for everyday carrying
customer_reviews.text: Great bag for everyday carrying. I like how it comes with an additional little carrying case as well. The big isnt as bulky as I was thinking which is nice as well. its pretty sleek and the quality seems to be on point. I can also fit my stand and some other game cases in it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, could use room for 2 controllers
customer_reviews.text: Very good but not enough room to carry two controllers. Solid quality and it has a smaller kinda hard shell-type case inside. I’m happy I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice console carrying bag, very well made!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very well made Nintendo switch carrying bag. It's well padded and made from a nice canvas material. Would highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: April Thornton

product_meta.title: PowerA Everywhere Messenger Bag for Nintendo Switch
product_meta.description: Color:Gray BlackThe everywhere messenger bag stores the complete Nintendo Switch system for easy portability, and features a removable internal case for carrying the Nintendo Switch handheld style. This bag is Officially Licensed by the Nintendo Switch team so you can game however you like, wherever you like.
feature_bullets: Stores the complete Nintendo Switch system for Easy portability
2 in 1 design with Removable internal case that carries Nintendo Switch for handheld mode
Fitted compartments keep all components secure
Adjustable shoulder strap with padding for added comfort
Officially Licensed by Nintendo for Nintendo Switch
